hero.title: About AI Automation LA
hero.subtitle: Your Local AI Automation Partner
hero.description: We're a Los Angeles-based team of AI automation experts helping local businesses implement cutting-edge technology solutions that work 24/7.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2023, AI Automation LA was born from seeing countless LA businesses struggle with repetitive tasks, missed calls, and manual processes. We saw an opportunity to bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI technology and practical business solutions.
story.mission: Our mission is simple: make AI automation accessible, affordable, and effective for every Los Angeles business.
story.vision: We envision a future where every LA business can compete with enterprise-level automation, regardless of size or budget.

members.name: Alex Rodriguez
members.bio: 10+ years in AI and automation, former tech lead at Google

members.name: Sarah Kim
members.bio: Expert in workflow optimization and business process automation

members.name: Marcus Chen
members.bio: Full-stack developer specializing in AI integration and voice technology

items.title: Local First
items.description: We understand LA businesses because we ARE an LA business

items.title: Results Driven
items.description: Every solution we build must deliver measurable ROI

items.title: Human-Centered
items.description: AI should enhance human work, not replace human connection

items.title: Continuous Innovation
items.description: We stay ahead of AI trends to keep your business competitive

cta.title: Ready to Automate Your Business?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how AI can transform your operations
